page.title: 19A DAY IN MY LIFE IN 1985
page.content: My name is Sarah Siddall.On Sunday mornings my alarm clock goes off at 7.15am.I take my face cloth & towel into the bathroom to wash & get dres- sed.At 8am I go downstairs for my bre- akfast of cereal & toast.At 9am we set out on foot to Church for the 9.30am childrens service.After Church we walk home and get changed to go to the all- otment.Here we grow carrots,potatoes, peas,beans,cabbages,cauliflowers,straw berries,plums & gooseberries.Today Iam going to weed the strawberries.On arr- iving home we smell our delicious Sun- day lunch of pork,peas,& newly picked potatoes,we have apple pie for sweet. After lunch we rest & play tennis.At 4pm my dad takes us swimming.We drive to the swimming pool & spend 30mins in the pool.Afterwards we drive home for our tea of bread & jam.At 8pm we have our bath, a glass of milk, then bed.
